alert.note: Alert for St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 5:52PM EST until January 10 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EST FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN ST. LUCIE COUNTY... At 551 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saint Lucie West, or near White City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 550 PM quarter sized hail was observed in rural Saint Lucie County. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Fort Pierce, White City, Port Saint Lucie River Park and Indian River Estates. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
